page.title: 03LOCAL SAYINGS AND DIALECT
page.content: In Leicestershire we use slang words to replace some words in our everyday conversation.Here are some examples of how we may speak.{ {HOW WE GREET PEOPLE:} {ayup/watcha/hiya ***}hello {see ya/tarrar ***}goodbye {LOCAL SAYINGS: {okey man ***}ice cream man {criggy ***}Christmas {shove off, buzz off ***}go away{ {shut ya gob /cakehole ***}be quiet{ {ace /fab/brill ***}good. {summat ***}something. {I dunno ***}I don't know. {intit/innit ***}isn't it {note/nuffin ***}nothing {crikey/cor/wow ***}I am amazed. {ya wot ***}pardon.
